Package gears.sidescroller.world.entities

Class Player

java.lang.Object
gears.sidescroller.world.core.WorldObject
gears.sidescroller.world.core.MobileWorldObject
gears.sidescroller.world.entities.AbstractEntity
gears.sidescroller.world.entities.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonSerializable, Collidable, Illuminating
public class Player extends AbstractEntity implements Illuminating
A Player is an AbstractEntity which can pick up and use AbstractItems.

    • useItem
